review_text: This seems to be helping my stress levels and my cortisol issues. Solaray True Herbs Passion Flower: A Calming and Relaxing Herbal Supplement

I recently had the opportunity to try Solaray True Herbs Passion Flower, and I must say that it has been a pleasant addition to my daily routine. As someone who values natural remedies for relaxation and stress relief, I found this herbal supplement to be quite effective.

The first thing that impressed me about Solaray True Herbs Passion Flower was its high-quality formulation. The product contains pure passion flower extract, which is known for its calming properties. Passion flower has a long history of traditional use as a natural remedy for anxiety and sleep issues, and Solaray has captured its benefits in a convenient capsule form.

Upon taking the supplement, I noticed a gentle sense of relaxation washing over me. Solaray True Herbs Passion Flower helped me unwind after a long and stressful day, allowing me to find a state of calmness and tranquility. It helped alleviate the anxious thoughts that often plague my mind and left me feeling more at ease.

One of the standout features of this product is its ability to promote a restful night's sleep. I struggle with occasional insomnia, and I found that taking Solaray True Herbs Passion Flower before bed helped me fall asleep faster and experience a deeper, more rejuvenating sleep. Waking up feeling refreshed and energized became more consistent with the inclusion of this supplement in my nighttime routine.

Another aspect that I appreciate about Solaray is their commitment to quality and transparency. They rigorously test their products for purity, potency, and authenticity, ensuring that consumers receive a reliable and trustworthy supplement. This dedication to quality gives me peace of mind knowing that I am consuming a product that meets stringent standards.

However, I do have one minor concern. While the effects of Solaray True Herbs Passion Flower were generally positive, I did experience occasional drowsiness during the daytime. This is a known side effect of passion flower, and it may affect individuals differently. It is important to be mindful of this potential drowsiness, especially if you need to remain alert and focused throughout the day.

In conclusion, Solaray True Herbs Passion Flower is a commendable herbal supplement for those seeking natural relaxation and improved sleep quality. Its high-quality formulation, calming effects, and commitment to transparency make it a reliable choice. However, it is essential to be aware of the potential drowsiness side effect and adjust your dosage accordingly. If you are looking for a natural remedy to promote relaxation and support restful sleep, Solaray True Herbs Passion Flower is definitely worth considering.

review_title: Hassle-Free Purchase and Quality Herbal Supplement
review_text:
I recently purchased Solaray's True Herbs Passion Flower supplement, which contains 100 VegCaps of 350 mg each from iHerb. The following is a detailed review regarding the packaging, delivery to Ukraine, and the mechanism of work associated with this product:

Packaging:
The product arrived in a durable and secure packaging. The bottle containing the VegCaps was tightly sealed, ensuring the safety and freshness of the passion flower supplement. It was encased in a box with sufficient padding to prevent any damage during transit. The label on the bottle was clear and informative, providing all the necessary details regarding the product‚Äôs ingredients, usage instructions, and expiration date.

Delivery Time to Ukraine:
The delivery was fairly smooth, with the product arriving at my location in Ukraine within the specified time frame of about 12 days as stated on the iHerb website at the time of purchase. The tracking information provided was accurate and regularly updated, which made it easy to monitor the shipment's progress.

Mechanism of Work:
The Solaray True Herbs Passion Flower supplement is designed to support relaxation and potentially aid in managing stress. Passion Flower is known for its calming properties and has been traditionally used to alleviate anxiety and promote better sleep. Each VegCap contains 350 mg of passion flower, which is a substantial dose aimed at delivering the herb's potential benefits. The veggie capsules are easy to swallow and are suitable for individuals adhering to a vegetarian or vegan lifestyle. The product claims to adhere to good manufacturing practices ensuring a high-quality herbal supplement.

In summary, the whole process from placing the order to receiving and reviewing the product was straightforward and satisfactory. This review is based on factual observations and does not contain personal impressions regarding the product's effects on health.

I've tried a number of sleep aids. Melatonin, CBD, and teas (a variety of them). Passion Flower has worked from the first moment I've used it. I've noticed my legs sometimes feel restless at night, especially after long mountain bike rides. I no longer feel this. If I have exercised heavily I will take 2 at bedtime, on regular days I take just one at bedtime. It has improved the quality of my sleep. My Fitbit sleep scores show it too! In the nine weeks before starting Passion Flower I only scored in the 80s for a sleep scored 3 times. In the last 9 weeks, I have had twelve scores in the 80's. Four times as many! Passion flower is a wonderful herbal supplement for soothing anxiety and promoting restful sleep. Compared with valerian, another similar herb, the taste is lighter (passion flower is grassy, valerian earthy), and the effects are similarly lighter - valerian can produce dizzying and overpowering dreams, while passion flower has a general light calming effect. Overall less soporific than valerian. Taking one capsule during the day won't knock you out at work - it will simply calm your nerves, offering a more natural antidote to pharmaceuticals like Ativan. When taken for sleep, it leaves a bit of a sleepy feeling in the morning, but a much less fuzzy feeling than valerian. Can cause some mild stomach upset such as bloating, but nothing dire. I have taken it most days for several months and have not noted any ill effects except for the aforementioned occasional stomach bloating. This product is good value for money, lasting a minimum 50 days, if the consumer takes two capsules daily. I have found that using three capsules for severe insomnia causes no ill effect except a bit of fuzzy-headedness in the morning.

I took this supplement when I was having anxiety and sleep issues. It really aids in relaxation and on the first night, knocked me out completely and I had a wonderful night's sleep. review_title: Great natural product to relieve anxiety!
review_text:
I have suffered from anxiety disorder for many years and have at times taken medication (alprazolam/xanax) for it.  I first tried Passion Flower as a tea about a year ago when I went on a Candida Free diet.  I had a tremendous amount of anxiety, one of many symptoms I experienced as the Candida Albicans died off.  I could tell the exact moment the tea started to take effect.  I experienced a relaxed euphoric feeling about ten minutes after drinking it.  It occurred to me that it probably came in supplement form.  I love to enjoy a warm relaxing cup of tea, but supplements can be a little more convenient.  I went to my local Health Hut and bought Solaray Passion Flower capsules, some more tea, Ashwagandha (Oregon‚Äôs Wild Harvest), and Valerian Root (Solaray.)  The Valerian Root didn‚Äôt do much for me, and I can‚Äôt get past the smell.  The Ashwagandha had some benefit, but made me tired.  The Passion Flower works the best for me.  There are different types of anxiety, and everybody is different.  The anxiety I experience is one of worrying and obsessive thoughts.  I do a lot of problem-solving in my head.  I take two capsules (a total of 700 mg) of Solaray Passion Flower each morning.  I fill in with a cup or two of tea throughout the day if needed.  I no longer notice that distinct feeling I had after those first couple cups of tea, but I do notice that I don‚Äôt experience as much anxiety throughout the day.  Since the Ashwagandha made me tired, I decided to add that to my evening routine and I take three capsules (a total of 1200 mg) at bedtime.  

This is my first purchase at iherb.com.  I have bought this same supplement from Health Hut and Amazon, and iHerb beat their price by a couple bucks.  They shipped the item super fast ‚Äì shipped same day, and arrived in two days.  Very pleased with the Solaray Passion Flower supplement, and with iHerb!

Common side effects of passion flower are

dizziness,
drowsiness,
confusion,
nausea,
vomiting,
decreased blood pressure, and
abnormal heart rate and rhythm. Passionflower might cause sleepiness and drowsiness. Taking passionflower along with sedative medications might cause too much sleepiness. We all want to buy a piece of health and beauty for a reasonable price. Just keep in mind that when taking a supplement you need to consider all side effects and drug interactions first. And come up with a regimen which avoids bad combinations, favors good ones and takes into consideration the best time of the day to take the supplement. As for oils, they also have some side effects. Before using any oil, or any cosmetic product, for the first time, you should do a patch test to make sure you're not allergic.

Passionflower helped me find inner balance and feel calmer even in the most stressful moments. I also noticed that I became less irritable and able to concentrate better on my tasks. Solaray, True Herbs, Passionflower is a great choice for those looking for a natural way to support their nervous system and improve their overall well-being. I recommend it to everyone!

Passiflora is an herbal preparation that is made from the flowers of the Passiflora incarnata plant. Each capsule contains 350 mg of passionflower powder. Taken in the right dose, it can help relieve nervous tension, improve sleep quality, and reduce symptoms of anxiety. However, the recommended dose should not be exceeded and a doctor should be consulted before taking it, especially if you have any medical problems or are taking any medications. The composition of passionflower may contain various biologically active substances, including alkaloids, flavonoids and coumarins, which can have a calming and relaxing effect on the nervous system. Passionflower may also contain acids such as citric acid, ascorbic acid, and butyric acid, which may help improve metabolism and protect cells from oxidative stress.
